attributes.action: take immediate steps to instigate international action to stop rainforest destruction wherever it is taking place and to protect rainforests in general.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We must STOP rainforest destruction for any reason. Rainforests are increasingly being destroyed for biofuels, monocultures like palm oil or soya plantations and for livestock. Rainforests embody diversity and habitats for both people and other species.  Other attempts to curb climate change will be useless if we destroy our forests which act as an irreplaceable water pump for the planet. By now there should be a strong international rainforest protection treaty.  The rainforests are the lungs of the world.
